categorization.description: Classification of 28 commercial principles into Non-Negotiable and Negotiable categories

non_negotiable.description: Terms representing DuraCube's firm commercial positions that CANNOT be compromised

negotiable.description: Terms with flexibility that CAN be discussed during contract negotiation

principles.name: Limitation of Liability
principles.standard: Cap of 100% of the Contract value
red_flags: Carve-outs that effectively negate the cap

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Contract liability cap <= 100% of contract value
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Contract liability cap > 100% OR unlimited

negotiation_positions.preferred: 100% cap on all liability
negotiation_positions.fallback: Higher cap with specific carve-outs for gross negligence only

principles.departure_template: Replace: '[current term]' with 'Liability limited to 100% of Contract Value'

principles.name: Consequential Damages
principles.standard: Neither party is liable to the other for any consequential loss
red_flags: Broad definitions of direct damages that capture consequential losses

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Mutual exclusion of all consequential damages
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: One-sided exclusion or no exclusion

negotiation_positions.preferred: Mutual exclusion of all consequential damages
negotiation_positions.fallback: Limited consequential damages with specific caps

principles.departure_template: Insert: 'Neither party shall be liable to the other for any consequential, indirect, or special damages'

principles.name: Head Contract Provision
principles.standard: No Head Contract provision: DuraCube is not obligated to accept the terms and conditions outlined in the Head Contract document
red_flags: Automatic incorporation of head contract terms
References to compliance with head contract

compliance_logic.compliant_if: No head contract provisions or specific limited agreed provisions
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Blanket incorporation of head contract terms

negotiation_positions.preferred: Complete exclusion of head contract provisions
negotiation_positions.fallback: Limited specific provisions identified and agreed
negotiation_positions.deal_breaker: Blanket incorporation of unknown head contract terms

principles.departure_template: Delete: head contract flow-down provisions OR Amend: to specify only agreed provisions

principles.name: Liquidated Damages
principles.standard: Limited to a max of 10% of the Contract value, and the Contract must specifically say that LDs are the Principal's sole remedy for delay. Liquidated Damages under the Head Contract are not applicable
red_flags: No exclusivity clause for delay remedies

compliance_logic.compliant_if: LDs <= 10% of contract value AND stated as sole remedy for delay
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: LDs > 10% OR not exclusive remedy OR head contract LDs apply

negotiation_positions.preferred: 10% cap with sole remedy provision
negotiation_positions.deal_breaker: Uncapped LDs or multiple delay remedies

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Liquidated Damages capped at 10% of Contract Value as the Principal's sole remedy for delay'

principles.name: Extension of Time
principles.standard: DuraCube should be entitled to an extension of time (EOT) and demonstrated actual cost for delays not caused by DuraCube, including war and its effect, material delays, material shortages, fuel shortages, delay in granting access to the Site, Epidemics, Pandemics (including COVID-19), Pandemic event declared by a local, state, and/or federal authority, Quarantine Restrictions, Inclement Weather, Force Majeure and events beyond the reasonable control of the DuraCube
red_flags: No provision for supply chain delays

compliance_logic.compliant_if: EOT with time AND cost relief for comprehensive list of events
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Limited events OR time only without cost

negotiation_positions.preferred: Full list with time and cost relief
negotiation_positions.fallback: Time relief for all events, cost for force majeure only
negotiation_positions.deal_breaker: No pandemic or supply chain provisions

principles.departure_template: Insert: 'DuraCube entitled to EOT and demonstrated actual costs for delays including pandemic, supply chain, access, weather, and force majeure events'

principles.name: Force Majeure
principles.standard: Should be entitled to an EOT and demonstrated actual cost

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Force majeure provides time AND cost relief
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Time only without cost recovery
compliance_logic.no_term_risk: MEDIUM - may not have force majeure protection

negotiation_positions.preferred: Time and full cost recovery

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Force majeure events entitle DuraCube to EOT and recovery of demonstrated actual costs'

principles.name: Variations: Accelerations, Omissions
principles.standard: Variation direction shall be in writing or agreed upon prior to commencement. DuraCube can claim demonstrated actual costs incurred due to any direction resulting from change of scope or programme and where applicable EOT
red_flags: Fixed variation rates without adjustment mechanism

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Written direction required with full cost recovery
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Oral variations OR fixed rates without adjustment
compliance_logic.no_term_risk: HIGH - vulnerable to unpaid scope changes

negotiation_positions.preferred: Written direction with full cost recovery

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'All variations require written direction prior to commencement with DuraCube entitled to demonstrated actual costs and applicable EOT'

principles.name: Time Bars/Notification Period
principles.standard: Notification periods should be at least 5 business days
red_flags: Absolute time bars without relief provisions

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Notification period >= 5 business days
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Notification period < 5 business days OR absolute time bar
compliance_logic.no_term_risk: MEDIUM - no strict time bars may be favorable

negotiation_positions.preferred: 5+ business days with reasonable excuse provisions

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Notification period extended to minimum 5 business days'

principles.name: Assessment Period
principles.standard: 10 business days assessment period for all claims

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Assessment period <= 10 business days
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Assessment period > 10 business days OR unlimited
compliance_logic.no_term_risk: MEDIUM - no defined timeframe may cause delays

negotiation_positions.preferred: 10 business days with deemed approval

principles.departure_template: Insert: 'Claims to be assessed within 10 business days, failing which deemed approved'

principles.name: Service for Notices
principles.standard: Email should be included

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Email included as valid service method
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Email excluded OR registered post only

negotiation_positions.preferred: Email as primary service method

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Notices may be served by email to designated addresses'

principles.name: Termination
principles.standard: The party's rights and remedies shall be reciprocal
red_flags: Different notice periods for each party

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Termination rights are reciprocal for both parties
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: One-sided termination rights

negotiation_positions.preferred: Complete reciprocity in all termination provisions

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Termination rights and remedies to be reciprocal for both parties'

principles.name: Termination for Convenience
principles.standard: DuraCube must be paid for demonstrated actual costs including overheads, completed works to date, reasonable costs of ordered materials, and demobilisation expenses. Security must be released

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Full cost recovery including overheads, materials, demob AND security released
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Partial recovery only OR security not released
compliance_logic.no_term_risk: HIGH - no protection for sunk costs

negotiation_positions.preferred: Full cost recovery plus margin on completed work

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'On termination for convenience, DuraCube entitled to payment for completed work, ordered materials, demobilisation costs, and overheads with immediate security release'

principles.name: Dispute Resolution
principles.standard: Senior representatives of both parties with the authority to negotiate a resolution prior to consideration of Adjudication

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Senior executive negotiation required before formal proceedings
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Immediate escalation to formal proceedings

negotiation_positions.preferred: Mandatory senior executive negotiation

principles.departure_template: Insert: 'Disputes to be escalated to senior representatives with authority to resolve before formal proceedings'

principles.name: Payment and Cash Neutrality
principles.standard: Payment term 14 days End of Month, subjected to the credit limit approval

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Payment within 14 days EOM OR better
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Payment > 30 days OR pay when paid

negotiation_positions.preferred: 14 days EOM

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Payment due 14 days End of Month following invoice'

principles.name: Security & Parent Company Guarantees
principles.standard: DuraCube agrees to 2 x 2.5% dated Commonwealth Bank Guarantee as a form of Security. DuraCube only accepts dated bank guarantees and does not agree to unconditional bank guarantees. BG 1 expires on the Practical Completion date. BG 2 expires after the end of Defect Liability Period (52 weeks/12 months). DuraCube does not provide for cash retention. DuraCube does not agree to provide a Parent Company Guarantee
red_flags: Expiry dates beyond PC and DLP end (52 weeks/12 months)

compliance_logic.compliant_if: No security required (FAVORABLE) OR security <= 5% with dated guarantees only
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Security > 5% OR unconditional guarantees OR cash retention OR parent company guarantee required

negotiation_positions.preferred: 2 x 2.5% dated guarantees (BG1 expires at PC, BG2 expires 52 weeks/12 months after PC)
negotiation_positions.fallback: Dated guarantees with negotiated expiry within 30 days of milestones
negotiation_positions.deal_breaker: Unconditional guarantees, cash retention, or parent guarantee

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Security limited to 2 x 2.5% dated bank guarantees: BG1 expiring at PC, BG2 expiring 52 weeks after PC. No unconditional guarantees, cash retention, or parent company guarantees'

principles.name: Release of Security
principles.standard: 50% of Security is released on the date of Practical Completion of the Contract (BG 1 expires) and 50% upon the expiry date of the defect liability period of the Contract (BG 2 expires after 52 weeks/12 months)
red_flags: Extended retention beyond 52 weeks/12 months DLP
Requirements to return or cancel guarantees

compliance_logic.compliant_if: No security required (FAVORABLE - auto compliant) OR 50% at PC, 50% at DLP end with dated guarantees
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Release beyond DLP OR conditional release OR no automatic expiry
compliance_logic.no_term_risk: Depends on Principle 15 - if no security, auto compliant

negotiation_positions.preferred: Dated guarantees with automatic expiry (PC and 52 weeks/12 months after)
negotiation_positions.deal_breaker: Unconditional guarantees requiring consent for release

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Security to be via dated guarantees: BG1 (50%) expires at PC, BG2 (50%) expires 52 weeks after PC'

principles.name: Defects Liability Period
principles.standard: DuraCube accepts a defect liability period of 52 weeks/12 months from the date of Practical Completion (PC) with no re-warranty period. DuraCube offers a 15 years warranty as per www.DuraCube.com.au (this is DuraCube's voluntary offering - if not required by customer/contract, this is favorable and compliant)
red_flags: DLP calculated in calendar months that may exceed 52 weeks
Extended warranty requirements BEYOND what DuraCube voluntarily offers

compliance_logic.compliant_if: DLP <= 52 weeks OR 12 months with no re-warranty
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: DLP > 52 weeks/12 months OR includes re-warranty
compliance_logic.no_term_risk: HIGH - needs insertion of DLP terms
compliance_logic.special_note: If contract does NOT mention or require the 15-year warranty, this is COMPLIANT and FAVORABLE

negotiation_positions.preferred: 52 weeks or 12 months with no re-warranty (no extended warranty requirement)

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Defects Liability Period limited to 52 weeks from Practical Completion with no re-warranty period'

principles.name: Indemnities
principles.standard: Indemnities, where applicable, will be reciprocal. However, DuraCube can agree to non-reciprocal terms, provided they are reduced proportionally
red_flags: No proportional reduction for non-reciprocal terms

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Reciprocal indemnities OR proportionally reduced non-reciprocal
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Unlimited one-sided indemnities without reduction

negotiation_positions.preferred: Fully reciprocal indemnities

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Indemnities to be reciprocal, or if non-reciprocal, proportionally reduced'

principles.name: Proportionate Liability Act
principles.standard: The Proportionate Liability Act must not be excluded in the Contract

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Proportionate liability preserved OR not mentioned
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Proportionate liability excluded OR joint and several imposed
compliance_logic.no_term_risk: LOW - statutory protection applies by default

negotiation_positions.preferred: Full application of proportionate liability

principles.departure_template: Delete: any clause excluding proportionate liability legislation

principles.name: Risk & Title Transfer
principles.standard: Risk will transfer on delivery and acceptance and title on payment of the Works/Services
red_flags: Risk transfer on delivery without acceptance

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Risk on accepted delivery AND title on payment
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Risk before acceptance OR title before payment

negotiation_positions.preferred: Risk on accepted delivery, title on payment
negotiation_positions.fallback: Risk on delivery with inspection period

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Risk transfers on delivery and acceptance; title transfers on payment'

principles.name: Unfixed Materials
principles.standard: Entitlement to claim is limited to scenarios where DuraCube delivers materials to the Site but encounters impediments preventing installation

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Payment entitlement for delivered materials when installation impeded
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Payment only on full installation

negotiation_positions.preferred: Payment on delivery for impediment scenarios

principles.departure_template: Insert: 'DuraCube entitled to payment for materials delivered to site where installation impeded by Principal or others'

principles.name: Intellectual Property
principles.standard: Background IP vest in DuraCube. IP developed during the project is paid for and vest in the Principal
red_flags: No payment trigger for IP transfer

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Background IP retained AND project IP transfers on payment
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Background IP transferred OR project IP without payment

negotiation_positions.preferred: Background retained, project IP on payment

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Background IP remains with DuraCube. Project-specific IP transfers to Principal upon full payment'

principles.name: Urgent Protection
principles.standard: No blanket acceptance of urgent protection clause/instruction. Where urgent protection is required DuraCube should be able to recover demonstrated actual costs with provision of 1 day notice

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Case-by-case approval with cost recovery and notice
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Blanket obligation without cost recovery

negotiation_positions.preferred: Case-by-case approval with full costs
negotiation_positions.fallback: Pre-agreed cost rates for urgent work

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Urgent protection works require specific authorization with DuraCube entitled to demonstrated actual costs and 1 day notice'

principles.name: Set Off
principles.standard: An agreement must take place prior to set off consideration

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Mutual agreement required before any set-off
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Unilateral set-off rights

negotiation_positions.preferred: No set-off without agreement

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'No set-off against payments without prior written agreement between parties'

principles.name: Insurances
principles.standard: DuraCube will provide: Public Liability Insurance (General & Product): $20M; Contract Works Insurance material damage: max project Value $400k; Professional Indemnity Insurance: NOT PROVIDED - DuraCube does not provide PI Insurance. DuraCube is listed as interested party, not joint names

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Insurance requirements <= DuraCube limits AND no PI required (FAVORABLE if no insurance requirements)
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Insurance > limits OR Professional Indemnity required
compliance_logic.critical_alert: Professional Indemnity Insurance requirement = AUTOMATIC NON-COMPLIANT

negotiation_positions.preferred: Insurance as per stated limits, NO Professional Indemnity
negotiation_positions.fallback: Project-specific additional coverage if paid (except PI)

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'Insurance limited to: Public Liability $20M, Contract Works $400k. DuraCube does not provide Professional Indemnity Insurance'

principles.name: Protection of Works
principles.standard: No provision shall be made for the protection of works following the completion of DuraCube's installation

compliance_logic.compliant_if: No protection obligation after DuraCube's installation complete
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Ongoing protection requirements post-completion

negotiation_positions.preferred: No protection after completion

principles.departure_template: Delete: any post-completion protection obligations for DuraCube's works

principles.name: Time is of the Essence / Escalation
principles.standard: Not applicable

compliance_logic.compliant_if: No time of essence OR no escalation provisions
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Time of essence included OR automatic escalation

negotiation_positions.preferred: Complete exclusion of both concepts
negotiation_positions.fallback: Limited to specific critical milestones only

principles.departure_template: Delete: 'time is of the essence' provisions and any automatic price escalation clauses

principles.name: Design Liability
principles.standard: DuraCube does not accept undefined liability. DuraCube's design scope is limited to the provision of the shop drawings
red_flags: Requirements for Professional Indemnity Insurance (cross-reference Principle 25)

compliance_logic.compliant_if: Design scope limited to shop drawings only
compliance_logic.non_compliant_if: Design liability beyond shop drawings OR fitness for purpose required

negotiation_positions.preferred: Shop drawings only, no design liability
negotiation_positions.deal_breaker: Full design liability or fitness for purpose

principles.departure_template: Amend: 'DuraCube's design scope limited to provision of shop drawings only. No fitness for purpose or broader design liability accepted'

professional_indemnity.rule: DuraCube does NOT provide PI insurance. Any requirement = NON-COMPLIANT
professional_indemnity.action: Immediate escalation required. Formal departure documentation needed.

unconditional_guarantees.rule: Only dated guarantees accepted. Unconditional/on-demand guarantees = NON-COMPLIANT
unconditional_guarantees.action: Must be replaced with dated guarantees expiring at PC and DLP

parent_company_guarantees.rule: Not provided under any circumstances = NON-COMPLIANT if required

three_pass_extraction.pass_1: Structure Mapping - Map all sections, headings, page numbers
three_pass_extraction.pass_2: Targeted Extraction - Search using principle keywords from search_terms
three_pass_extraction.pass_3: Validation - Verify no clauses missed, check for conflicts

three_step_comparison.step_1: Evidence Extraction - Extract exact contract language AND DuraCube standard
three_step_comparison.step_2: Substantive Comparison - Compare meaning, assess implications
three_step_comparison.step_3: Classification Decision - Assign: Compliant | Non-Compliant | No Term

constitutional_logic.more_favorable: Contract terms > DuraCube standard (better for DuraCube) -> COMPLIANT
constitutional_logic.less_favorable: Contract terms < DuraCube standard (worse for DuraCube) -> NON-COMPLIANT
constitutional_logic.absent: No contract terms -> Assess using no_term_risk for each principle

favorability_assessment.rule: Absence of burden terms (insurance, security, guarantees) = FAVORABLE = COMPLIANT
favorability_assessment.rule_2: Absence of protective terms (liability caps, EOT) = needs insertion
decision_tree: Term would PROTECT DuraCube (liability cap, EOT)? -> NO TERM = Departure needed
Term would BURDEN DuraCube (insurance, guarantees)? -> COMPLIANT (favorable)

interconnected_principles.relationship: If Principle 15 = COMPLIANT (no security required), then Principle 16 = AUTOMATICALLY COMPLIANT
Both relate to professional services. PI Insurance and Design Liability are connected - DuraCube provides no professional design services
